component.name: Multiple Probeset Filter
component.author: geWorkbench Development Team
component.description: In Affymetrix3â€™ gene expression chips, some genes may be represented by more than one probeset. This filter allows removal of all but a single probeset for each gene, using one of three different methods. Background - Different probesets may have different levels of specificity or may favor alternate splice variants of a gene. Not all splice variants of a gene may be expressed in any given cellular system. In addition, different variants of the same gene may have quite different expression patterns in a given system, e.g. one might be up-regulated, while another is down-regulated.
